thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 288 2
thread.title: Patrick Stoel
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Patrick Stoel

author: Patrick Stoel
title: Patrick Stoel
text:
I had cases inserts ordered.
1 box was broken and missed 1 of the 10 inserts.
and 1 box was gone.
Banggood sends 2 new cases. I am very happy with it.
Thanks Banggood!!!
I buy a lot at Banggood because it is very well organized.
They choose always the best way of shipping.
and it's always fast in the Netherlands.
That is why I choose for Banggood.
kind regards, Patrick
